item.title: Trust
item.description: Preface This is a continuation of a previous post, wherein we talked about trust. Information I’m less trusting then I’d honestly like to admit. While I feel I can tell certain close friends some things, I feel as though I can’t tell them other things. Mostly do to feeling self conscious, or not wanting them to find something out about me. There are a fair few people even in my inner circle of friends who I would not tell that this blog exists.

item.title: Personal Space: NSFW
item.description: Preface This is going to be another post that just rambles. A bit of context I prefer, most of the time, to not have my personal space violated, I’d assume this is the norm among the majority of people. For me it stems from trust issues that I’ve had for quite a while now. I won’t scream or pitch a fight if my personal space is violated, rather I try to tell the person who violated it not to make the same mistake again.
